proposal: Hey pet lovers! 🐾 Noticed you're making life easier for small pet & bird owners with awesome deals on grooming and vet consultations. How about we add some extra treats to the mix? Imagine deploying your own DEX or hosting a community lottery - all while celebrating 51 holders in the ETH network. Let's make pet care not just easier, but also more rewarding for your community. 🐦🎰
